author: rvesse
msg: Refactor to use configured default HttpClient in remote queries and to allow optionally using configured default client even with authentication is used which may be desireable in some circumstances.
Also reformats some code to improve readability

author: rhuijben
msg: In the Windows build: make it much easier to apply a define through
all projects when building via project systems such as Visual Studio
by adding an optional -D option to gen-make.py.

author: sergeyb
msg: [CXF-5556] Initial updates to get 2.0 exception API not interfering with 1.1 API

author: elecharny
msg: o Get rid of the WriteTransaction class, it's now replaced by a simple flag
o We don't support the explicit transaction. Only automatic transactions are supported.
o Removal of the synchronized sections
